News.headline: DON'T FORGET: Free UK Delivery For Daggers Online Shop
News.page_title: DON'T FORGET: Free UK Delivery For Daggers Online Shop
News.URL_keywords: DON'T FORGET: Free UK Delivery For Daggers Online Shop
News.short_description: Dont miss out on our free UK delivery on our online shop which ends on Wednesday 30th November.
News.description:
Fans will be able to receive Free UK Delivery on all products on the Daggers Online Shop until Wednesday 30th November, take advantage of the free postage to get the perfect Christmas gift for the special Daggers fan in your life with only three days left on the offer.

This special offer will be available to all supporters when they purchase products on the website and will only be available throughout November so make sure you don't miss your opportunity!

See below for purchase details.

Purchase:
http://www.daggers-shop.co.uk/

Please see below for the information regarding all of the last dates for orders to be delivered in time for Christmas day:

International Standard (formerly Airmail) and all International Tracking and Signature Services (formerly Airsure® and International Signed For®):
Saturday 3 December - Africa, Middle East
Wednesday 7 December - Cyprus, Asia, Far East (including Japan), Eastern Europe (except Poland, Czech Republic and Slovakia)
Thursday 8 December - Caribbean, Central & South America
Saturday 10 December - Greece, Australia, New Zealand
Wednesday 14 December - Czech Republic, Germany, Italy, Poland
Thursday 15 December - Canada, Finland, Sweden, USA
Friday 16 December - Austria, Denmark, Iceland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland
Saturday 17 December - Belgium, France, Ireland, Luxembourg

UK Inland Services:
Tuesday 20 December - 2nd Class and Royal Mail Signed For®
Wednesday 21 December - 1st Class and Royal Mail Signed For®
Thursday 22 December - Royal Mail Special Delivery Guaranteed®
Friday 23 December - Special Delivery Saturday Guaranteed

More information regarding last postage dates can be found here.
